About Me

I am a student new to Web Development. I am currently learning all the tools and skills necessary to become a Full Stack Web Developer in the near future. Besides working and studying, I enjoy being outdoors in nature, going running and spending time with my family. I have a black cat named Rollo and he is my best friend :)

Work

Playlist Generator

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

An application that gives the user the option to create playlists based on a genre. A playlist is displayed with a preview as well as lyrics and a link to the spotify page for the song. ach song is displayed with a media player that gives a 30 second preview. When a song is clicked the lyrics will be displayed directly below the song, if lyrics cannot be found through the API a message will be displayed instead of lyrics. The spotify logo after each song will open a new tab to the song's spotify page giving the user the option to save it to their spotify profile. After each playlist is generated, a button below the dropdown menu will save the three most recent playlists so the user can load a recent playlist.

View Project on GitHub

Taskmaster-Pro

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

A web app that allows users to create tasks with descriptions and dute dates. The task data is persistent and the project also allows the user to update/change tasks and be able to delete them from the interface.

View Project on GitHub

Run Buddy

Built With: HTML, CSS

This is a custom built website that offers fitness training services. It was built with HTML and CSS as one of my first ever projects.

View Project on GitHub

Robot-Gladiators

Built With: JavaScript, HTML

A small game application that allows users to fight a robot until defeat, fight another robot after defeat and allows the players to choose to fight or skip the battle and continue fighting other robots until the user's robot is defeated.

View Project on GitHub
